premise_source_doc_sentence: Glenn Close  (  born March 19 , 1947  )  is an American actress , singer and film producer .

claim: Glenn Close made her debut in a 1974 play.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Her film debut was in The World According to Garp  (  1982  )  , which she followed up with supporting roles in The Big Chill  (  1983  )  and The Natural  (  1984  )  ; all three earned her nominations for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress .

claim: Glenn Close made her debut in a 1974 play.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She would later receive nominations for the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performances in Fatal Attraction  (  1987  )  , Dangerous Liaisons  (  1988  )  and Albert Nobbs  (  2011  )  .

claim: Glenn Close made her debut in a 1974 play.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Her other films include Jagged Edge  (  1985  )  , Hamlet  (  1990  )  , Reversal of Fortune  (  1990  )  , 101 Dalmatians  (  1996  )  , Paradise Road  (  1997  )  , Air Force One  (  1997  )  , Cookie 's Fortune  (  1999  )  , Heights  (  2005  )  , Guardians of the Galaxy  (  2014  )  and The Girl With All The Gifts  (  2016  )  .

claim: Glenn Close made her debut in a 1974 play.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Close is a six-time Academy Award nominee , tying the record for being the actress with the most nominations never to have won  (  along with Deborah Kerr and Thelma Ritter  )  .

claim: Glenn Close made her debut in a 1974 play.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In addition , she has been nominated for four Tonys  (  three wins  )  , fourteen Emmys  (  three wins  )  , thirteen Golden Globes  (  two wins  )  , two Drama Desk Awards  (  one win  )  and eight Screen Actors Guild Awards  (  one win  )  .
